3: Sorry. Must have woke you up.
Finished with the skirmish, Alpha returns to the bench to find Luna long awake. Luna merely shakes her head at Alpha's apology.
What's the matter? You're staring at me.
Ahaha... Nothing. It really fits you.
Yeah. The texture is nice. I think it's some famous brand from the Golden Age. The design makes swinging my sword easy.
That's not what I meant by fitting you.
Luna's words send Alpha into deep thought. Then suddenly, as if in realization, she opens her mouth and continues.
Well... Next time, if you want pictures of me, just say so. You don't have to take them secretly.
Well, it's late. Let's go back.
Luna rises from the bench and puts a jacket on Alpha, then turns and saunters through the road they came from.
Alpha nods, and falls in step with Luna after accepting her jacket.
After Luna and Alpha left, a figure emerges from the shadows of the walkway.
He gazes in the direction of the two and falls into deep thought.
